title: Slab Serif: Ad Art Design headings
content:
Link: [Ad Art Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454/http:/adartdesign.co.uk/)

Excuse me if it is an easy one.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AdArtDesign_5766.png)

 [‹ Yum.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454/http:/typophile.com/node/41132 "Go to previous forum topic") [please can you identify this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454/http:/typophile.com/node/41136 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dedaluz

comments.content: The Serif by Luc de Groot

Hi Albert,

that’s [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lucasfonts/theserif_basic_plain/?sample_text=Ad%20Art%20Design&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) by [Luc(as) de Groot](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221454/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Luc%252528as%252529%252Bde%252BGroot).  
F
